Can someone upload this season in windows media player? Real player won't work on my computer for some reason and I really like this season it's my favorite I'd really appreciate it if someone could upload this season in avi a.k.a. windows media format...

Hmm, quality is ok, some files have audio out of sync, but as a whole it's totally watchable and worth the download (unless you are a purist who just watches the "best possible quality")

A word though about the use of realPlayer, that has to be the most stupid mediaplayer there is, why not just use VLC. Usually works on anything, but not this, had to get the new RealPlayer. Waste of harddrive.

Still, im happy i could watch the season and got it quite fast. Thanks to the uploader.
am for watching .rmvb u need just k-lite codec pack and u can watch it on any player (u can find codec pack here: http://www.codecguide.com/download_mega.htm )
